title: MNF Preview: Steelers vs. Giants, Titans vs. Broncos Gambling Picks & DFS Advice (Football 9/14)
description:
Will Brinson is joined by Tyler Sullivan to preview the first two Monday Night Football games of the 2020 season. The guys give gambling and fantasy advice for both Steelers-Giants (3:00) and Titans-Broncos (21:30). Ben Roethlisberger is making a return to the field after playing just 2 weeks last season. Will his presence be enough to lay nearly a touchdown with road-favorite Pittsburgh? Meanwhile, the Broncos have been a 'hot' team this offseason, but they're dealing with some injuries and going up against a team that made the AFC Championship in January. What side to you want to be on to close out Week 1? Will and Tyler offer game picks plus player props and DFS lineups to target!
 
To learn more about listener data and our privacy practices visit: https://www.audacyinc.com/privacy-policy
